Welcome to our game

DISCOVER

Some of you have already played the werewolf game,

but do you know our game,
The virus of Cybertown ?

Our game is a new version of the werewolf game, a village where the digital takes place.
Our team has prepared you a game that you will love ! Each character is a digital job in Cybertown but of course in the digital world there’s also viruses.

The goal ? Eliminate all the viruses. But be careful the viruses are trying to eliminate all the citizens too and they are good to hide their identity.

So what are you waiting for to come to Cybertown and play with us ?!

I WANNA PLAY !

A serious game is a video game made for learning or training, not just for fun. Its main goal is to teach specific skills, share knowledge, or encourage problem-solving in an interactive and enjoyable way. And that's what we had to do during this week of the English Game organized by our school, My Digital School. But I'll let the video explain this concept to you, it'll do a better job than us !
